attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law to ensure that any director; owner; chairman or chief executive of a company which goes into liquidation is banned from taking up any such position in a newly formed company for at least 10 years from the date of failure of the last company he/she was involved with.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Far too many company owners/directors are setting up new companies immediately following the closure of their previous company, as a way of avoiding their responsibility to clients/investors in the old company.  This is not right and has to be stopped.
